thread.title: Tour the ‘Back to the Future’ filming locations
thread.title_full: Tour the ‘Back to the Future’ filming locations - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Tour the ‘Back to the Future’ filming locations
text: The future has arrived! The date Marty McFly and Dr. Emmett “Doc” Brown travel to in “Back to the Future II” is Oct. 21, 2015. Most of the locations in the film and the Oct. 21, 2105 “future” were filmed in the San Gabriel and San Fernando valleys in Los Angeles County, California. Here’s a guide to some notable locations. If you can’t see the map on your mobile device, find it here. Advertisement
